description: In accordance with Rules and Regulations Section 1.12 (http://bit.ly/17Oq75y), the Rent Board of Arbitration sets the annual allowable rent increase for rent controlled units. The new rates are effective every year on March 1. The amount is based on 60% of the percentage increase in the Consumer Price Index (CPI) for All Urban Consumers in the San Francisco-Oakland-San Jose region for the 12-month period ending October 31, as posted in November by the Bureau of Labor Statistics.

name: Annual Allowable Rent Increase for Units Under Rent Control
